title: [Offer evaluation] Atlassian vs Rippling | Senior Software Engineer
content:
Ex - 10 YOE

Company: Atlassian
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer (P50)
Location: Bengaluru (Full remote)
Joining Bonus: 9L
Base Salary: INR 69L
Performance Bonus: 9.75L
Stocks: $180,000 over 4 years
Yearly: INR ~117L + 9L (Joining bonus)

Company: Rippling
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Bengaluru
Joining Bonus : None
Base Salary: INR 80L
Performance Bonus: 12L
Stocks: $75,000 USD over 4 years
Yearly: INR ~108L

I am looking to join Atlassian as RSUs are way higher than Rippling, but Rippling might go IPO in the next 2-3 years. 
Please give your opinions.

title: Deliveroo | Senior Software Engineer | Bangalore
content:
Education: Btech in ECE
Years of Experience: 6
Current Compensation: 40 L CTC
Prior Experience: e-commerce

Date of the Offer: May 2024
Company: Deliveroo
Title/Level: Senior engineer
Location: BLR
Salary: Rs. 63L
Performance bonus: 10% of fixed (depends on ratings)
Total comp (Salary + bonus): ~Rs. 69.3 L
Benefits: Insurances, gym reimbursement 24K etc
Other details: HRs are very good, WLB, latest tech stack, no food in BLR office
Notice period: 1 month
Probationay period: 3 months

title: Zepto | Tech Lead / Staff | Bangalore
content:
Education: Btech in ECE
Years of Experience: 6
Current Compensation: 40 L CTC
Prior Experience: e-commerce

Date of the Offer: June 2024
Company: Zepto
Title/Level: Staff engineer
Location: BLR
Salary: Rs. 71.7L
Retention bonus: Rs. 5L
ESOP: Rs 65L for 4 years (Series F)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~Rs. 93 L
Benefits: Insurances, flexi tax components etc
Other details: Zepto's recruitment team is very fast and the process is super smooth. They share interview result in just 2 hours. The interviewers are super cool and if they feel your bar can be raised for a higher role, they would push for it. Moreover, they are growing very fast.
Notice period: 1 month
Probationay period: 3 months

Update: They were up for salary negotiation when I declined the offer. **Had I joined, the CTC would have been more than 1 Crore.**
